DEVDCB Struct Reference
[Generic Character Device]

Detailed Description

Device driver's private data structure.

Field Documentation

HANDLE DEVDCB::dcb_rrdy
 

Receiver ready queue.

volatile int DEVDCB::dcb_rcnt
 

Number of bytes in the receive buffer.

Receive buffer.

HANDLE DEVDCB::dcb_trdy
 

Transmitter ready queue.

int DEVDCB::dcb_tlen
 

Number of bytes in the transmit buffer.

Number of bytes already transmitted.
